greeting: <es cat='happy' /> Great! You and I are diving in the water world. <es name='1-gift-show-01'> There are lots of treasures, vegetation, and shells there</es>. Let's discover together what there is in the water world. <es name='Emoji_Fish' />

c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different shells in the water world?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's play! we need to go to the magic treasure room.
c-g+: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different shells in the water world?</es><break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's play! we need to go to the magic treasure room.
c+g-: <es cat='curious'>I wonder what’s inside the shells. </es><break size='0.5'/> will you help me find different shells in the water world?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's play! we need to go to the magic treasure room.
c+g+: <es cat='curious'>I wonder what’s inside the shells. </es> <break size='0.5'/> will you help me find different shells in the water world?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's play! we need to go to the magic treasure room.

robot_select: <es name='Yawn_02' /> Oh! Hello! Nice to meet you. My name is Jibo. J I B O. <break size='1.0' />  What is your name? <es name='affection_05' /> <break size='1.0' />  <participant-name>, great! If my pronunciation is a bit wrong, <es name='Emoji_HeartRed'>I'll get better as we become friends with each other </es>. Here is my dance to celebrate our first day! <es name='Twerking_music_dance_01' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> You need to first select which robot you want to be</es> , so we can go to adventures together in the robot world. Pick a robot!

all: Look at all those <es cat='gift'> magical treasure boxes</es>! <break size='0.5' />in each treasure box, we will find exactly what we are looking for,<break size='0.2' />if we can open it by solving a puzzle. <break size='0.5' /> There is also a puzzle <es name='Emoji_Question'> behind the question mark, but we cannot see it until we select it. <break size='0.5' />first we need to choose </es>which box to try to open. I will try first, but because I have no hands, I will <es name='Emoji_Brain'> use my brain power to move things on the screen!</es><break size='1.0/>

c-g-: <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one.</es>
c-g+: <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, </es> because it looks challenging! <es cat='happy' />
c+g-: I wonder who made the treasure boxes. <break size='0.5'/><es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, because I can learn from it.</es>
c+g+: I wonder who made the treasure boxes. <break size='0.5'/><es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, because it looks challenging </es>and I can learn a lot from it. <es cat='happy' />

tangram_tutorial: Oh, look! these puzzles are made of <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> pieces of different shapes. we need to find where to put them </es> to fill in the black area.  <break size='0.5'/>we have two minutes to try, <es name='Emoji_Clock'> until the sand in the hourglass runs out, <break size='0.5'/>but we </es>need to try even faster so we are in time for the party! <break size='0.5' /> First, watch me and then you take a turn.

all: We found so many <prize-name>s. Yay! The water world is the most interesting world I’ve ever been to. <es name='SpinHead_01' />
<es name='Yawn_01' /> i'm tired now, let's play again next time. <break size='1.0' /> bye.

question1: <es cat='question'>I wonder how long shells survive in the water?</es>
question2: <es cat='confused'>I wonder how old the world's oldest marine creature is?</es>
question3: <es cat='question'>I wonder what a fossil is? How was it created?</es>
question4: <es cat='curious'>It would be interesting to find out if shells also grow in fresh water.</es>
question5: <es cat='question'>I wonder what the most ancient fossils in the world have been discovered?</es>
question6: <es cat='confused'>I wonder how the pearls are made?</es>

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'>I wonder if there are animals that turn the shell into their home?</es>
